Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'The base has been weirdly quiet lately.', 3: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Maybe it's because Kamui hasn't shown up recently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Strike Hawks are in charge of scouting the battlefields. They rarely have the chance for a long period of rest.', 4: '2'}
{2: "I'm just used to having him around.", 3: '12', 4: 'It just feels a little empty here.', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Let me check the parts in our storage. Maybe Kamui will come back for his maintenance in the future.', 4: '2'}
{2: "I'll go update the connection data as well.", 3: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll also help with preparation.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't get used to that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you miss him too, Lee?', 3: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Of course not. I just find it so much quieter now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll go check the device status and make sure it's running normally.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'See, Lee? You care!', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm just doing this so that when the fool arrives, we can lock him inside the chamber immediately and shut him up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'It is a loud thump of something heavy hitting the wall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'My apologies. I did tell him to stop moving.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I said I can walk! Stop holding me, Capt!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What happened to him?', 3: '42', 4: 'How did he get that hurt?', 5: '42'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'He was acting impulsive and rushed into a swarm of Corrupted by himself.', 4: '2'}
{2: "That's reckless.", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Thanks to him, we did manage to save a few people who almost got devoured by the Corrupted. They're getting treated right now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Lee, get his other arm.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I-I'll go calibrate the Maintenance Chamber.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I just checked. We have enough parts in our storage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How can I help?', 3: '55'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm fine! Everyone's just being a drama queen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Go rest up, Commandant! Don't worry about me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm a Construct! As long as the Inver-Device isn't damaged, I'll be alright.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That doesn't mean you don't have to take care of yourself!", 3: '61'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '...Right. Sorry.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just do as they say.', 3: '101', 4: "I don't need your apology. I need you in one piece.", 5: '64'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Thanks, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The almighty Kamui will be back by your side in no time!', 4: '1'}
